description: This file defines an interface class IPluginStarter for starting plugins within a Thunder plugin framework. It declares a virtual destructor and a pure virtual method activatePlugin to activate a plugin with retry logic, including parameters for retry count and delay.

classes.name: IPluginStarter
classes.description: An interface for starting Thunder plugins, with a method to activate a plugin with retries.

methods.name: activatePlugin
methods.description: Activates a plugin with a specified number of retries and delay between retries.
